scripts.bucket: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket routereport-cloudformation-build --region eu-west-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-west-1
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file built_template.yaml --s3-bucket routereport-cloudformation-build --s3-prefix routereport --output-template-file packaged_template.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name routereport-dev --template-file packaged_template.yaml --s3-bucket routereport-cloudformation-build --s3-prefix routereport --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides Env=dev --region eu-west-1
